nodes.text: Fiddler 10, also known as a Boiler Droid, was a type of hovering droid owned and operated by Tig Fromm and the Fromm Gang. They worked inside Tig Fromm's base as a maintenance crew. While infiltrating the base, C-3PO tried to pretend he was the maintenance crew but was caught when the actual droids showed up. The droids were also present in the Fromm Gang prison.
